content: I will create a Python AI agent that can execute Python code. First, I'll create a file named `main.py` and add the basic code for the agent. The agent will have a simple loop that takes user input and executes it as Python code.

thoughts.subject: Starting the project
thoughts.description: I've just initiated the project. A `main.py` file has been generated within an empty directory. My next step will be to code the AI agent. The initial design will incorporate a basic loop, facilitating user input which is then executed as Python code. This will be the foundational element upon which further functionalities will be built.

toolCalls.name: write_file

response.output: Successfully created and wrote to new file: /Users/jnarowski/Dev/playground/src/test-project/main.py.

Writes content to a specified file in the local filesystem.
